product_name: Mad Rock Super Tech Straight Gate Carabiner
long_description: The light and strong Mad Rock Super Tech straight gate carabiner is ideal for making your own quickdraws. At 35g, the Mad Rock Super Tech carabiner is lighter than many carabiners in the same general size range. Slight indentation in the gate is easy to find with your finger and makes clipping quick and easy. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings.
short_description: The light and strong Mad Rock Super Tech straight gate carabiner is ideal for making your own quickdraws.
